mapper.insert: insert into itrip_product_store (id, productType, productId, store, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{producttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update itrip_product_store set productType = #{producttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productId = #{productid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store = #{store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedBy = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, productType, productId, store, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy from itrip_product_store
